alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 3:19AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Occasional snow showers Wednesday afternoon will become a period of heavier snow Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph, with gusts from 35 to 50 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 5 PM Wednesday to 11 AM Thursday: Alpine 6 to 10 inches Pinetop-Lkside 9 to 13 inches Show Low 7 to 11 inches Whiteriver 5 to 9 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
